description:
Based out of Western NY, the English Project has solidified itself in the North Eastern U.S. as a collective that pushes the envelope of groove and  improvisation. Comprised of core members Chris English on drums and vocals, Paul McArdle on guitar, Andres Rivera on bass and Dave Solazzo on piano, the English Project seamlessly fuses funk and soul with elements of modern jazz. They’ve also opened for artists such as Bobby Brown, Arrested Development, Jazz is Phsh, Giant Panda Guerrilla Dub Squad, Sophistafunk, Thunderbody, John Kadlecik Band, and many others. “The English Project, Vol.1” is  out now. Please get your copy now.

Mosswalk is a brand new troupe of musical adventurers who focus on dynamic and melodic song contstruction and immersive, organic live shows. The band plays high-energy, dancable groove and prog style rock. Sean McNamara - guitar and vocals, Dan Heuskin - bass and vocals, Ryan Cass - keys and vocals, Jamie Sunshine - drums and vocals. 

www.facebook.com/mosswalk

www.youtube.com/channel/UCA1MqgLn9n7glB-obrWwOmg/videos?view_as=subscriber
name: The English Project & Mosswalk at Nietzsche's
